title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Tim Tszyu is taking his talents to the USA
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Tim Tszyu is taking his talents to the USA
description:
Chris talks with the longtime boxing writer, Dan Rafael about the biggest stories from the week in the world of boxing. Later, he sits down with Australian professional boxer Tim Tszyu to discuss his career and why now was the right time to come over to the states to fight.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
